title: Great Weapon Master
content: onus Action. When you land a critical hit or kill a target with ANY melee weapon attack, you can make another melee weapon attack as a bonus action on that turn. It's important to try and make the most out of each of your turns, trying to use your action, bonus action, movement, everything that you can possibly use if you need it.
